body: Avicus, for some stupid reason, has decided to keep the server on 1.7. But I don't know how to change the version back to 1.7 from 1.8. How do I?
body_tagged: Avicus, for some stupid reason, has decided to keep the server on 1.7. But I don't know how to change the version back to 1.7 from 1.8. How do I?
title: Help!

replies.body: It isn't for some stupid reason... They have to update all the mods and bukkit isn't ready yet.
replies.body_tagged: It isn't for some stupid reason... They have to update all the mods and bukkit isn't ready yet.

replies.body:
Many servers have the same problem with Bukkit and Bungee Cords. It'll take them a while to get it updated. 2-3 weeks was the estimated time for servers like Avicus.

I don't know our devs tho so I can't really comment.
